story.title: Our Story
story.content1: K&C Trading Journal was born from a passion for computer science and financial markets. As a trader, I quickly realized the importance of tracking and analyzing performance to progress.
story.content2: However, most available solutions were either too expensive or limited in their features. I therefore decided to create a complete, professional platform that is 100% free.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content1: Our mission is simple: provide all traders, whether beginners or experienced, with a professional tool to track, analyze and optimize their trading performance.
mission.content2: We firmly believe that tracking your progress should not be a paid luxury, especially when you're still learning and not yet making money from trading.
mission.content3: That's why K&C Trading Journal is and will remain 100% free, with no hidden fees, no limitations, no advertising.

free.title: Free
free.content: A professional tool accessible to everyone, free of charge.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.content: No hidden fees, no surprise limitations.

quality.title: Quality
quality.content: Professional features and a modern interface.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: Your data is secure and belongs to you. You can delete it at any time.

future.title: The Future
future.content: We continue to improve K&C Trading Journal by adding new features based on feedback from our community. Our goal is to remain the best free trading journal solution available.
